pageProduct.name: Optislim Optiman Premium Shake Variety Pack 14 x 56g
pageProduct.description:
Information

The packaging delivered may vary from the image shown. Formulation is the same.

General Information

 OptiMan LCD (Low Calorie Diet) shakes are deliciously formulated meal replacements to be used in conjunction with a low calorie diet.
A unique weight loss formulation using the award winning and patented ingredient - OptiBiome.
OptiBiome has been developed by leading specialists in metabolism and nutrition and trialled by leading UK universities. Combined with a clinically proven weight loss method, OptiBiome can provide additional benefits to support weight loss. Each shake contains the adequate protein, vitamins and minerals that are essential for your healthy weight loss.

Warnings

If you have any medical conditions or are taking medication, please consult your Healthcare Professional prior to commencing a weight management program. Children under 18 should use this product ONLY under the strict supervision of a Healthcare Professional.

Common Uses

Formulated Meal Replacement for Weight Control

Ingredients

Contains flavours: Vanilla, Chocolate, Salted Caramel and Coffee

Directions

Mix 3 level scoops to 350ml of chilled water in a shaker and shake to dissolve.
Drink immediately, do not store for use at a later time.
Each day, replace breakfast and lunch with an OptiMan LCD Shake and have a low calorie dinner and snacks. Unlike many similar products on the market, your dinner and snacks are made up of everyday regular foods including carbohydrates like pasta and rice.
